variables.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) to provision for the                   volume.
variables.name: Iops
variables.required: Conditional. If you specify io1 for the volume type,                   you must specify this property.

variables.description: The volume mount point, such as /dev/sdh.
variables.name: MountPoint

variables.description: The number of disks in the volume.
variables.name: NumberOfDisks

variables.description: The type of volume, such as magnetic or SSD. For valid values, see VolumeConfiguration in                   the AWS OpsWorks API Reference.
variables.name: VolumeType
